main_content: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is the straight path.
O you who have believed, fear Allah as He should be feared and do not die except as Muslims [in submission to Him].
And Allah is the best of providers.
If the sea were ink for the words of my lord, the sea would surely be consumed before the words of my lord are exhausted.
Indeed, those who purchase disbelief [in exchange] for faith, never will they harm Allah at all, and for them is a painful punishment.
And He has made me blessed wherever I am.
And whoever desires the reward of this world, We will give him thereof, and whoever desires the reward of the Hereafter, We will give him thereof. And We will reward the grateful.
But do they not know that Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare?
O mankind, eat from whatever is on earth [that is] lawful and good and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.
Or were they created by nothing, or are they their own creators?
Allah loves those who place their trust in Him.
Or were they created by nothing, or are they their own creators?
He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.
O you who have believed, fear Allah and give up what remains [due to you] of interest, if you should be believers.
Indeed, Prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing.
Call upon me, I will respond to you.
Never will you attain the good [reward] until you spend [in the way of Allah] from that which you love.
Say, "O People of the Scripture, why do you disbelieve in the verses of Allah while Allah is Witness over what you do?"
Or were they created by nothing, or are they their own creators?
And He found you lost and guided [you].
Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is the straight path.
But yes, whoever fulfills his commitment and fears Allah - then indeed, Allah loves those who fear Him.
And no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.
O mankind, worship your Lord, who created you and those before you, that you may become righteous.
Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth.
Do you not know that to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and [that] you have not besides Allah any protector or any helper?
But if they turn away, then indeed, Allah is Knowing of the corrupters.
Who spend [in the cause of Allah] during ease and hardship and who restrain anger and who pardon the people, and Allah loves the doers of good.
And He is with you wherever you are.
And who despairs from the mercy of his Lord, except those astray?
And fear the Fire, which has been prepared for the disbelievers.
Kind speech and forgiveness are better than charity followed by injury.
And once you have taken a decision, place your trust in Allah. Surely, Allah loves those who place their trust in Him.
And whoever puts all his trust in Allah, He will be enough for him.
Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of Supplication.
Allah loves those who fear Him.
O you who have believed, decreed upon you is fasting as it was decreed upon those before you that you may become righteous.
So remember Me, I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
Those who spend their wealth [in Allah's way] by night and by day, secretly and publicly, they will have their reward with their Lord. And no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.
Say, [O Muḥammad], "If you should love Allah, then follow me, [so] Allah will love you and forgive you your sins. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."
And We will reward the grateful.
Say to those who disbelieve, "You will be overcome and gathered together to Hell, and wretched is the resting place."
The truth is from your Lord, so never be among the doubters.
Never will you attain the good [reward] until you spend [in the way of Allah] from that which you love. And whatever you spend, indeed, Allah is Knowing of it.
My mercy embraces all things.
Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established.
And let there be from you a nation inviting to good, enjoining what is right and forbidding what is wrong, and those will be the successful.
Between them is a barrier which they do not transgress.
Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
So remember me, I will remember you.
And whether you die or are killed, unto Allah you will be gathered.
and Allah loves the doers of good.
And fight in the cause of Allah and know that Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
Those who spend their wealth [in Allah's way] by night and by day, secretly and publicly, they will have their reward with their Lord.
They are [varying] degrees in the sight of Allah and Allah is Seeing of whatever they do.
He gives wisdom to whom He wills, and whoever has been given wisdom has certainly been given much good. And none will remember except those of understanding.
Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive.
You prefer the life of this world, while the hereafter is better & more lasting.
And none will remember except those of understanding.
Fight in the way of Allah those who fight against you but do not transgress.
And [remember] when your Lord proclaimed, ‘If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]; but if you deny, indeed, ‘My punishment is severe.
If Allah should aid you, no one can overcome you, but if He should forsake you, who is there that can aid you after Him?
When He decrees a matter, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.
There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
And whoever desires other than Islam as religion, never will it be accepted from him, and he, in the Hereafter, will be among the losers.
And do not mix the truth with falsehood or conceal the truth while you know [it].
Say, "Obey Allah and the Messenger. But if you turn away - then indeed, Allah does not like the disbelievers."
Fight in the way of Allah those who fight against you but do not transgress. Indeed, Allah does not like transgressors.
Satan threatens you with poverty and orders you to immorality, while Allah promises you forgiveness from Him and bounty.
And obey Allah and the Messenger that you may obtain mercy.
It may be that you dislike a thing which is good for you and that you like a thing which is bad for you. Allah knows but you do not know.
And Allah would not punish them while they seek forgivenes.
Indeed, those who disbelieve it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them they will not believe.
And We created you in pairs.
And fear a Day when you will be returned to Allah. Then every soul will be compensated for what it earned, and they will not be wronged [i.e., treated unjustly].
Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow that is a great attainment.
Allah has sent down the Book in truth. And indeed, those who differ over the Book are in extreme dissension.
And verily the hereafter, will be better for thee. Than the present
He gives wisdom to whom He wills, and whoever has been given wisdom has certainly been given much good.
Allah is your protector, and He is the best of helpers.
This [Qur’ān] is a clear statement to [all] the people and a guidance and instruction for those conscious of Allah.
Indeed, Allah does not like transgressors.
And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.
